home.title: PRAGATI.ai
home.heroTitle: Transform Your Farming with Smart Technology
home.joinThousands: Join thousands of farmers using smart technology to boost their harvest and reduce costs

features.aiDescription: Advanced machine learning algorithms analyze satellite data, weather patterns, and historical trends for intelligent farming decisions.
features.marketDescription: Real-time mandi prices, demand forecasting, and optimal selling strategies to maximize your agricultural profits.
features.financialDescription: Comprehensive debt counseling, loan guidance, and financial planning tailored for agricultural enterprises.
features.satelliteDescription: Access to real-time satellite imagery, vegetation indices, and soil moisture data for precision agriculture.
features.sustainabilityDescription: Eco-friendly farming practices, carbon footprint tracking, and sustainable resource management solutions.
features.emergencyDescription: Round-the-clock agricultural emergency assistance and expert consultation for critical farming situations.
